subject: [Radiance-general] Texture Baking?
body:
I will release the code for uv baking at next workshop in a month.
with the promise that anybody using it and modifying it will share with the others.
No let?s focus on holiday time!
:-)
G

PS if you need this straight away let me know and will PM
